content: Jeff Lima’s film debut was in the Oscar nominated film Half Nelson. Since then, he has been part of notable films by Sony Pictures, Twentieth Century Fox, and Warner Bros. Jeff Lima recurs on NBC’s Chicago Fire. He was a series regular for HBO’s Show Me A Hero and other credits include episodic’s for Netflix and CBS. Jeff Lima is the founder of Innovative Pictures through which he serves as EP. He is the grantor of the Jeff Lima Production Award which is bestowed upon a New York University Tisch School of the Arts directing student of the Maurice Kanbar Institute of Film and Television Graduate Division. Jeff Lima maintains active advocacy for inner City youth. He is a founding member of the Achievement Lab After School which serves 150 children in the Bronx section of New York.
